```{r VIM_hotdeck_{{id}}, include=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
load_result <- load({{id}})

name <- load_result$name
dataset <- load_result$dataset
target <- load_result$target

pos=dataset[1, target]
dataset[, target] <- factor(unlist(lapply(dataset[, target], function(x) ifelse(x==pos, 1, 0))), levels=c(1, 0))
colnames(dataset) <- make.names(colnames(dataset),unique = T)

learner <- lrn('classif.ranger', predict_type='prob', num.trees = 100)
result <- train_and_test(dataset, imputer=impute_VIM_hotdeck, learner=learner, target=target, positive='1', title=paste0(name, ' + VIM_hotdeck'))

time_data[nrow(time_data)+1, ] <- c('VIM_hotdeck', name, result$train_dataset_imputation_time, result$test_dataset_imputation_time)
test_data[nrow(test_data)+1, ] <- c('VIM_hotdeck', name, result$test_auc, result$test_bacc, result$test_mcc)
```
